wikipedia_page.main: Lilian Margery Dring (née Welch; 1908–1998) was a British artist known for her paintings, poster designs and textile designs. needlework and embroidery work.

response: Lee's first job was as an assistant to Travers in his studio. For a while he joined James and Lilian Dring in an artistic co-operative. His works included a range of craft and art work produced at Southside Studios in Clapham, London. He also worked part-time teaching at Kingston and Bromley schools of art.
